title: Update color scheme to an electric, technology-themed palette

requirements.text: Update the app’s visual color palette to an “electric / technology” theme (neon-tech aesthetic) while keeping the existing layout and the exact headline text and code-entry UI unchanged.

quotes: make the color like electric and technology

acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a cohesive electric/tech palette (e.g., dark base with bright neon accents such as cyan/teal/magenta) applied consistently across background, text, borders, and focus states.
The headline still displays the exact text “Bytes console winning!” with distinct emphasis per line, but with updated electric/tech colors (e.g., primary and accent feel neon/tech).
The code input’s border and focus ring clearly reflect the updated electric/tech accent color(s) and remain accessible with sufficient contrast against the background.
No changes are made to user-facing copy (e.g., “Enter Code”, placeholder text, footer text) other than color/styling.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the exact headline text “Bytes console winning!” unchanged.
nonGoals: Adding backend logic or persisting the entered code.
Changing authentication behavior or adding new integrations.
